subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: David Lee, the Golden State All-Star forward who was making the first playoff appearance of his career, tore his right hip flexor in the Warriors’ Game 1 loss to Denver and is done for the postseason.
snippet: David Lee, the Golden State All-Star forward who was making the first playoff appearance of his career, tore his right hip flexor in the Warriors’ Game 1 loss to Denver and is done for the postseason.
